@description.name: @description
@description.body: The package tree.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Updates the tree on the left.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
docTree
          {qxl.apiviewer.dao.Package} the documentation tree to use for
          updating.
@param.description:
the documentation tree to use for
          updating.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Selects a certain class.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: className {String} the name of the class to show.
@param.description: the name of the class to show.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} Whether the class name was valid and could be selected.
@return.description: Whether the class name was valid and could be selected.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Create a callback which loads the child nodes of a tree folder

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
packageDoc
          {qxl.apiviewer.dao.Package} the documentation node of the package.
@param.description: the documentation node of the package.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
depth
          {var} current depth in the tree

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fills a package tree node with tree nodes for the sub packages and classes.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
docNode
          {qxl.apiviewer.dao.Package} the documentation node of the package.
@param.description: the documentation node of the package.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
depth
          {var} current depth in the tree

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Selects all items of the managed object.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Adds the given item to the existing selection.

@throws.name: @throws
@throws.body: {Error} if the item is not a child element.
@throws.description: if the item is not a child element.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Removes the given item from the selection. Use {@link qx.ui.core.ISingleSelection#resetSelection} when you want to clear the whole selection at once.

@throws.name: @throws
@throws.body: {Error} if the item is not a child element.
@throws.description: if the item is not a child element.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns an array of currently selected items. Note: The result is only a set of selected items, so the order can differ from the sequence in which the items were added.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Replaces current selection with the given items.

@throws.name: @throws
@throws.body: {Error} if the item is not a child element.
@throws.description: if the item is not a child element.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Clears the whole selection at once.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Detects whether the given item is currently selected.

@throws.name: @throws
@throws.body: {Error} if the item is not a child element.
@throws.description: if the item is not a child element.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Whether the selection is empty.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns all elements which are selectable.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
all {Boolean} true for all selectables, false for the
   selectables the user can interactively select
@param.description:
true for all selectables, false for the
   selectables the user can interactively select

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Tries to set the selection using the given array containing the representative models for the selectables.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns an array of the selected models.

@return.name: @return
@return.body:
{Array} An array containing the models of the currently selected
   items.
@return.description:
An array containing the models of the currently selected
   items.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the field model value. Should also update the UI.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {var|null} Updates the field with the new model value.
@param.description: Updates the field with the new model value.

@return.name: @return
@return.body:
{null|Error} Should return an error when the type of
  model value is not compatible with the implementing class (the concrete field).
@return.description:
Should return an error when the type of
  model value is not compatible with the implementing class (the concrete field).

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the model value to its initial value. Should also update the UI.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns a consistent and up-to-date model value. Note: returned value can also be a promise of type Promise<*|null>.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {var|null} The model value plain or as promise.
@return.description: The model value plain or as promise.

@description.name: @description

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the internal selection manager. Use this with caution!

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Invert the selection. Select the non selected and deselect the selected.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the current lead item. Generally the item which was last modified by the user (tapped on etc.)

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Creates a new scrollbar. This can either be a styled qooxdoo scrollbar or a native browser scrollbar.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: orientation {String?"horizontal"} The initial scroll bar orientation

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Responsible for adding the event listener needed for scroll handling.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Responsible for removing the event listener needed for scroll handling.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Handler for the pointerdown event which simply stops the momentum scrolling.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Roll event handler

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Finds the first scrollable parent (in the parent chain).

@param.name: @param
@param.body: widget {qx.ui.core.LayoutItem} The widget to start from.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Whether the widget is scrollable.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the bounds of the given scrollable.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: scrollable {qx.ui.core.Widget} Scrollable which has scrollbar child controls.
@param.description: Scrollable which has scrollbar child controls.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Map} A map with all four bounds (e.g. {"left":0, "top":20, "right":0, "bottom":80}).
@return.description: A map with all four bounds (e.g. {"left":0, "top":20, "right":0, "bottom":80}).

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the edge type or null if the pointer isn't within one of the thresholds.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: diff {Map} Difference map with all for edgeTypes.
@param.description: Difference map with all for edgeTypes.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the axis ('x' or 'y') by the edge type.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: edgeType {String} One of the four edgeTypes ('left', 'right', 'top', 'bottom').

@throws.name: @throws
@throws.body: {Error} If edgeType is not one of the distinct four ones.
@throws.description: If edgeType is not one of the distinct four ones.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the threshold amount by edge type.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: edgeType {String} One of the four edgeTypes ('left', 'right', 'top', 'bottom').

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Number} The threshold of the x or y axis.
@return.description: The threshold of the x or y axis.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Whether the scrollbar is visible.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: scrollable {qx.ui.core.Widget} Scrollable which has scrollbar child controls.
@param.description: Scrollable which has scrollbar child controls.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Whether the scrollbar is exceeding it's maximum position.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: amount {Number} Amount to scroll which may be negative.
@param.description: Amount to scroll which may be negative.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} Whether the amount will exceed the scrollbar max position.
@return.description: Whether the amount will exceed the scrollbar max position.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Calculates the threshold exceedance (which may be negative).

@param.name: @param
@param.body: diff {Number} Difference value of one edgeType.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Calculates the scroll amount (which may be negative). The amount is influenced by the scrollbar size (bigger = faster) the exceedanceAmount (bigger = faster) and the slowDownFactor.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: exceedanceAmount {Number} Threshold exceedance amount (positive or negative).

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Scrolls the given scrollable on the given axis for the given amount.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: scrollable {qx.ui.core.Widget} Scrollable which has scrollbar child controls.
@param.description: Scrollable which has scrollbar child controls.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: exceedanceAmount {Number} Threshold exceedance amount (positive or negative).

DESTRUCTOR

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fires after the selection was modified

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fired when the model value was modified

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fired when the enabled state was modified

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fired when the valid state was modified

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fired when the invalidMessage was modified

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fired when the required was modified

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Pseudo event. It will never be fired because the array itself can not be changed. But the event description is needed for the data binding.
